| History                 = The KGB (Komitet Gosudarstvennoy Bezopasnosti) was the primary security agency of the Soviet Union. It was established in 1954 and abolished at its fall in December 1991. It was said that is the world's most effective information-gathering organization. It was responsible for creating various projects including the [[Black Widow Ops Program (Earth-616)|Red Room]].
